text: Carlos Villagrán Eslava (born 12 January 1944) is a Mexican actor, comedian, and former journalist. He is best known for playing Quico in the Televisa sitcom El Chavo del Ocho and the Telerey sitcom ¡Ah qué Kiko!. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican comedians Category:Mexican journalists Category:Actors from Mexico City
title: Carlos Villagrán
